results.title: Play Safe
results.creator_credit: Australian Road Safety Council, Video Films and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: Aimed at children, this film highlights a number of road safety aspects. Don Bradman talks to the children about avoiding accidents, both going and coming from school, and during playtime on the school playground.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Australian Road Safety Council, Video Films and Australian National Film Board
results.description: Aimed at children, this film highlights a number of road safety aspects. Don Bradman talks to the children about avoiding accidents, both going and coming from school, and during playtime on the school playground.

results.title: Zola
results.creator_credit: Derica Cole Washington, A'Ziah King, David Hinojosa, Katie Byron, Elizabeth Haggard, Kara Baker, David Kushner, Gia Walsh, Vince Jolivette, Janicza Bravo, Dave Franco, Jeremy O. Harris, Christine Vachon, Gigi Films, Ramona Films and Killer Films
results.brief_description: A waitress agrees to accompany an exotic dancer, her put-upon boyfriend, and her mysterious and domineering roommate on a road trip to Florida to seek their fortune at a high-end strip club.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Derica Cole Washington, A’Ziah King, David Hinojosa, Katie Byron, Elizabeth Haggard, Kara Baker, David Kushner, Gia Walsh, Vince Jolivette, Janicza Bravo, Dave Franco, Jeremy O. Harris, Christine Vachon, Gigi Films, Ramona Films and Killer Films

results.title: The Muncher  for ZX Spectrum 128
results.creator_credit: Rob Howard, Beam Software, Gremlin Graphics Software and Zero Wait
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover, badge and manual in a plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description: The Muncher [computer game]. The Muncher is a single player side scrolling action game. Players control a rampaging monster destroying buildings by climbing on them, breathing fire and jumping on people and cars while attempting to avoid getting shot at by people with guns. The game ends when the monster’s health has been depleted by being attacked.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rob Howard, Beam Software, Gremlin Graphics Software and Zero Wait
results.description: The Muncher [computer game]. The Muncher is a single player side scrolling action game. The game ends when the monster’s health has been depleted by being attacked.

The game ends when the monster’s health has been depleted by being attacked.

results.title: Fist II - The Legend Continues  for Spectrum 48/128
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover and paper insert in a plastic cassette case
results.brief_description: Fist II - The Legend Continues [computer game]. Fist II is a single player side scrolling beat ‘em up with adventure elements. Players travel through different environments, fighting various enemies, collecting items and visiting temples to power up the character to be strong enough to defeat the warlord and free the land.
results.title_for_label: Fist II - The Legend Continues for Spectrum 48/128

results.brief_description: Fighting Warrior [computer game]. Fighting Warrior is a single player side scrolling fighting game. Players have a high, mid and low attack, jump, duck and step back and must fight oncoming enemies in one on one combat.

results.title: Asterix and the Magic Cauldron [Commodore 64/128]
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover, game manual and plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description:
Asterix and the Magic Cauldron is a single player adventure arcade game. Players control Asterix through various maps, collecting keys for locked doors and fighting Romans and boars in search of seven pieces of Getafix’s Magic Cauldron. Fights take place on a separate screen mode. Stamina bars for each combatant appear on the side of the window. Defeating the combatant adds it to the food tally. If Asterix loses the fight, the window closes and he loses a life. The same system is used when fighting the Roman soldiers and when Asterix picks up objects.

Obelix will only follow if Asterix has a supply of hams which can be obtained from fighting boars. Asterix starts with five lives and one dose of Magic Potion per game, which can be activated by double tapping the fire button.

Original game developed by Beam Software for ZX Spectrum 48K, published in 1986 by Melbourne House.

Source: Play It Again website: http://www.ourdigitalheritage.org/archive/playitagain/games/asterix-and-the-magic-cauldron/

Last accessed: 1/05/2021
results.description:
Asterix and the Magic Cauldron is a single player adventure arcade game. Players control Asterix through various maps, collecting keys for locked doors and fighting Romans and boars in search of seven pieces of Getafix’s Magic Cauldron. Fights take place on a separate screen mode. Stamina bars for each combatant appear on the side of the window. Defeating the combatant adds it to the food tally. If Asterix loses the fight, the window closes and he loses a life. The same system is used when fighting the Roman soldiers and when Asterix picks up objects.

Obelix will only follow if Asterix has a supply of hams which can be obtained from fighting boars. Asterix starts with five lives and one dose of Magic Potion per game, which can be activated by double tapping the fire button.

Original game developed by Beam Software for ZX Spectrum 48K, published in 1986 by Melbourne House.

Source: Play It Again website: http://www.ourdigitalheritage.org/archive/playitagain/games/asterix-and-the-magic-cauldron/

Last accessed: 1/05/2021
description_for_label:
Asterix and the Magic Cauldron is a single player adventure arcade game. Players control Asterix through various maps, collecting keys for locked doors and fighting Romans and boars in search of seven pieces of Getafix’s Magic Cauldron. Fights take place on a separate screen mode. Stamina bars for each combatant appear on the side of the window. Defeating the combatant adds it to the food tally. If Asterix loses the fight, the window closes and he loses a life. The same system is used when fighting the Roman soldiers and when Asterix picks up objects.

Obelix will only follow if Asterix has a supply of hams which can be obtained from fighting boars. Asterix starts with five lives and one dose of Magic Potion per game, which can be activated by double tapping the fire button.

Original game developed by Beam Software for ZX Spectrum 48K, published in 1986 by Melbourne House.

Source: Play It Again website: http://www.ourdigitalheritage.org/archive/playitagain/games/asterix-and-the-magic-cauldron/

Last accessed: 1/05/2021

results.title: Doc the Destroyer  for ZX Spectrum 48/128
results.creator_credit: Geoff Evans, Paul Kidd, Melbourne House and Beam Software
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover and manual booklet in a plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description: Doc the Destroyer [computer game]. Doc the Destroyer is a side view, strategy arcade adventure in a post apocalyptic setting for one player. At the start of the game, players are given 60 points which they can distribute between five statistics Strength, Endurance, Intelligence, Luck and Charisma. As Doc, players are presented with various choices that determine your next action and some will throw the player into arcade styled combat.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Geoff Evans, Paul Kidd, Melbourne House and Beam Software
results.description: Doc the Destroyer [computer game]. Doc the Destroyer is a side view, strategy arcade adventure in a post apocalyptic setting for one player. At the start of the game, players are given 60 points which they can distribute between five statistics Strength, Endurance, Intelligence, Luck and Charisma. As Doc, players are presented with various choices that determine your next action and some will throw the player into arcade styled combat.

At the start of the game, players are given 60 points which they can distribute between five statistics Strength, Endurance, Intelligence, Luck and Charisma. As Doc, players are presented with various choices that determine your next action and some will throw the player into arcade styled combat.

results.title: Fighting Warrior  for Commodore 64
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover & manual insert in clear plastic cassette case
results.brief_description: Fighting Warrior [computer game] for Commodore 64. Fighting Warrior is a single player side scrolling fighting game. Players have a high, mid and low attack, jump, duck and step back and must fight oncoming enemies in one on one combat.

results.brief_description: Bazooka Bill [computer game]. Bazooka Bill is a single player side scrolling shoot ‘em up action plaformer. Bill fights his way through side scrolling maps of different islands to rescue General MacArthur. Bill begins with only his fists and can collect additional weaponry throughout his journey

results.title: Zim Sala Bim  for Commodore 64
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cardboard cassette case and plastic cassette tray.
results.brief_description: Zim Sala Bim [computer game]. Zim Sala Bim is a single player side scrolling graphical adventure game. The objective of the adventure is to break into the palace, steal the gold from the Sultan’s bedroom, get out and return to the secret cave and the village elders. Player are able to control the main character with either a joystick or keyboard keys through various environments. The character can be directed to perform various actions by typing two word commands made up of a verb followed by an action. A verb list is provided on the case. Results of player actions are given back as a text response. Items are scattered about the environment for players to retrieve and use.
results.description: Zim Sala Bim [computer game]. Zim Sala Bim is a single player side scrolling graphical adventure game. Player are able to control the main character with either a joystick or keyboard keys through various environments. The character can be directed to perform various actions by typing two word commands made up of a verb followed by an action. A verb list is provided on the case. Results of player actions are given back as a text response. Items are scattered about the environment for players to retrieve and use.
description_for_label: Zim Sala Bim [computer game]. Zim Sala Bim is a single player side scrolling graphical adventure game. The objective of the adventure is to break into the palace, steal the gold from the Sultan’s bedroom, get out and return to the secret cave and the village elders. Player are able to control the main character with either a joystick or keyboard keys through various environments. The character can be directed to perform various actions by typing two word commands made up of a verb followed by an action. A verb list is provided on the case. Results of player actions are given back as a text response. Items are scattered about the environment for players to retrieve and use.
